I

Ignore - Annotation Type in pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api.annotations
This annotation should be placed before client action parameters that are not meant to be serialized.
InactiveUserException - Exception in pl.bristleback.server.bristle.security.exception
This simple exception wraps all situations when username and password are correct but authentication process cannot be completed because of one of the following issues: user account is locked (userDetails.isAccountNonLocked() returns false) user account has expired (userDetails.isAccountNonExpired() returns false) user account is not enabled (userDetails.isEnabled() returns false) user credentials have expired (userDetails.isCredentialsNonExpired() returns false)
